import './index.css' import {Component} from 'react' import SuggestionItem from '../SuggestionItem' class GoogleSuggestions extends Component { state = {searchInput: ''} searchValue = event => { const searchValue = event.target.value this.setState = {searchInput: searchValue} } render() { const {suggestionsList} = this.props return (
    {suggestionsList.map(eachSuggestion => ( ))}
) } } export default GoogleSuggestions
